title: Subject: FOIA Request – Officer Narratives / Arrest & Incident Reports for Specified Case Numbers (Harvey Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140), I request electronic copies of the full Arrest/Incident Reports for the case numbers listed below, including the Officer Narrative(s) and any supplemental narrative(s) / supplements contained in the report package.

These case numbers were identified from the Arrest Log previously provided by the Harvey Police Department. I am NOT requesting any video or audio at this time—only the written reports.

List of Requested Cases (RMS-friendly format; listed in the body of this request):

1) Case/Report # HV-25-00007225 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/23/2025 — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense DUI — Location E 154TH ST / HALSTED

2) Case/Report # HV-25-00005455 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/06/2025 02:44 AM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location E 154TH ST / CENTER

3) Case/Report # HV-25-00005478 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/06/2025 10:56 AM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location W 159TH ST / DIXE HWY

4) Case/Report # HV-25-00005602 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/07/2025 10:52 AM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location W 159TH ST / ASHLAND AVE

5) Case/Report # HV-25-00005838 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/09/2025 05:33 PM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location W 145TH ST / HALSTED ST

6) Case/Report # HV-25-00006094 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/11/2025 08:21 PM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location E 146TH ST / HALSTED ST

7) Case/Report # HV-25-00006603 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/18/2025 03:27 PM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location W 154TH ST / HOYNE AVE

8) Case/Report # HV-25-0006805 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/19/2025 10:32 AM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location E 159TH ST / COMMERCIAL AVE

9) Case/Report # HV-25-0006890 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/20/2025 08:27 AM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location W 159TH ST / WESTERN AVE

10) Case/Report # HV-25-0006962 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/21/2025 09:20 AM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location E 147TH ST / WALLACE

11) Case/Report # HV-25-0007046 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/26/2025 11:20 AM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location E 159TH ST / WOOD AVE

12) Case/Report # HV-25-0007558 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/29/2025 03:25 PM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location E 147TH ST / HALSTED ST

13) Case/Report # HV-25-0007869 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/30/2025 08:31 PM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location E 150TH ST / HALSTED ST

14) Case/Report # HV-25-0008113 — Arrest/Incident Date/Time 03/31/2025 10:02 PM — Name UNKNOWN (as listed) — Primary Offense TRAFFIC STOP — Location W 147TH ST / LINCOLN AVE

Preferred Format & Delivery:
Please provide the records in PDF format and deliver them electronically (via the MuckRock portal/email).

Fees:
I agree to pay reasonable fees authorized under 5 ILCS 140/6. Please notify me in advance if the total fees are expected to exceed $50 before you incur any costs.

Redactions / Segregability:
If any portion of a record is exempt from disclosure, please redact only the exempt portion(s) and release all reasonably segregable non-exempt material.

If any part of this request is unclear or you believe it is unduly burdensome, please contact me and I will promptly work with you to clarify or narrow the request.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

William Benjamin Johnson
